column4: dialogUnbeaten
column5: dialogBeaten

column4: Are you a fellow student?  Let's head up to the battle arena then.  If you win I'll give you a key!
column5: You did fantastic!

column4: I won't give up my key easily!
column5: You might be good enough to beat my teacher!

column4: Let's see if we can learn from one another.
column5: That was great!  Here is a key to my teachers door.

column4: I am a Sage of Courage.  To be a Grand Sage you must demonstrate the ability to be courageous.
column5: You have demonstrated much courage in that battle,  but there is still more to learn.  Here is the first piece of the Courage Sage Seal.  Also,  here is a key to the hatchery.

column4: Each floor has students that are stronger than the previous floors.
column5: You are quite strong,  my friend!

column4: There wasn't much to do after we destroyed the ring...
column5: You would do well in the fellowship.

column4: My teacher has taught me well.  I will show you the strength of my birds!
column5: I admit they are weak to electric and ground moves.

column4: Courage is the ability to do a difficult thing.  I will test your courage now.
column5: You have shown me you understand courage,  here is the second piece to the Sage Seal of Courage.

column4: My Tatails are so cute...I mean cool!!
column5: How dare you do that to them!!

column4: Har Har,  let's see what you're made of my lad.
column5: Lad,  you put the hurting on me. Well done!

column4: Electricity is the life of machinery,  can you stand up to it?
column5: That was a shockingly good battle!

column4: You're shaping into quite the trainer.
column5: Here is the final piece to the Sage Seal of Courage,  you must fight the Grass Sage to have it fused together.

column4: It's a great day for a hike!
column5: It's always a great day for a hike!

column4: The flowers bloom just as my beauty blooms.
column5: It appears your skill blooms as the flowers do.

column4: One does not simply win a battle.
column5: We'll I guess one does...

column4: I will show you the true strength of the minions you are about to get.
column5: Go claim your prize,  here is a key to the hatchery.

column4: You have done very well so far,  but I will push you to your limits.  For I am Tafel the Grass Sage.
column5: That was fantastic!!  I award you the Sage Seal of Courage.n...nYou can now find random money chests in the Tower.

column4: I've got da Vudu mon.
column5: You killed da Vudu mon!

column4: ARE YOU READY FOR THE PAIN!!
column5: OUCH! I felt the pain on that one...

column4: I'm burning to battle you!
column5: Way to put out my fire.

column4: A Grand Sage needs passion!  I will test the depth of your passion!
column5: You are quite passionate!  Here is a piece of the Seal of Passion!

column4: Ooga booga,  ooga booga,  ooga booga!!
column5: Well.....that certainly didn't work!

column4: One must train very hard to reach the pinnacle.
column5: You train well,  very well.

column4: Hehehehe,  what bringggs you here!?
column5: Arrgh,  you're too strong! Stay away!

column4: I can see your passion is truely deepening!
column5: Excellent!  Here is the second piece of the Sage Seal of Passion!

column4: I'll show you how to battle mon.
column5: Looks like I could learn some pointers from you mon.

column4: Welcome to the jungle.
column5: That wasn't very fun.
I have broken my vows of silenece to say that was an AMAZING fight!!

column4: Passion is what drives our actions!  And the ability to act is vital for a Grand Sage!
column5: Well done!  Here is the third and final piece of the Sage Seal of Passion!

column4: Titoro will bring the heat
column5: You smothered my Titoro...

column4: I'm sure in my training.
column5: ...I must work harder it seems...

column4: I've got a few tricks up my sleeve mon.
column5: Well done mon,  I'll tell you a trick. When you're up against earth minions,  remember they are weak against plant,  water,  and undead moves.

column4: I will truely test your strength,  but the reward is worth it.
column5: Well done!  Go and claim your reward...it is well earned.

column4: I can feel the heat of your passion!  I am the Sage of Fire,  I will truely test your passion!
column5: You're passion is stronger than I expected.  Well done!!n...nThe Sage Seal of Passion grants you the ability to combine gems.

column4: I calculate that it is highly improbable that you'll win this fight.
column5: E=mc squared your good!!

column4: Prepare to be shredded!
column5: Looks like you did the shredding.

column4: Electricity is so much fun to play with!
column5: Ouch!  Your skill is shocking.

column4: A Grand Sage needs deep knowledge of minions and the world they live in.
column5: I can see the knowledge in your actions.  Here is a piece of the Sage Seal of Knowledge.

column4: My mom thinks I'm cool!

column4: Yeah,  so,  um.  Lets like battle.
column5: Wow, um, yeah, your like good.

column4: Prepare for a fatality.

column4: Your knowledge is growing?  Let's see by how much.
column5: Your knowledge is top notch!  Here is the second piece of the Sage Seal of Knowledge.

column4: Time to take you to school.
column5: Looks like you already know robots are weak to fire, water, electric, and dino moves.#

column4: Ah,  there you are.  I'm glad to see you!
column5: I enjoy our battles,  I feel like I learn so much!

column4: My eyes are aflame for a good fight!
column5: That burns good!

column4: If you have enough knowledge I will grant you the final piece of the Sage Seal of Knowledge.
column5: You're ready to challenge the Sage of Knowledge,  here is the final piece of the Seal.

column4: The world isn't going to science itself!
column5: Back to science I go then

column5: It looks like you have caller ID.

column4: Prepare to be tested.
column5: You have passed with flying colors!
